Dear Hagop and Rami,

I hope you’re doing well.

 

Could you please assist us in securing the insurance reimbursement for the flood that occurred last year? All other stores have received their reimbursements and resolved the issue, yet our VIP Lounge remains unaddressed.

 

Following the rain, we promptly informed you, and a member of your team conducted a survey and fulfilled the necessary requirements. However, I still don’t understand what is missing or why this process has not moved forward.

 

Please let me know if you can support us in resolving this matter or if I need to escalate it, as we can no longer afford further delays.

 

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best

L
